tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE prediction_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  feature_1 FLOAT,
  feature_2 FLOAT,
  label FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE forecasting (
  forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_id INT,
  forecast_date DATE,
  forecast_value FLOAT
)
